name: Fossill Stone Fire Pit with Steel Ring Insert
description: With a natural, multi-colored, textured surface of stacked stone, this Stone Fire Pit provides a stylish addition to a backyard or other outdoor venue. Its blocks and top caps are wedge-shaped, eliminating the hassle of cutting stone. The 2-piece steel ring insert attaches using the included bolts, making it easy to quickly set up the fire pit.44 in. interior diameter fire bowl with a 66 in. exterior diameter provides a wide area of access to the flameProvides 10-1/2 sq. ft. of heat for your patio or backyard; 14 in. fire pit heightNatural, multi-colored, textured, stacked stone design provides durability and stylishly accents your outdoor living spaceBlocks and top caps are wedge-shaped, eliminating the need for stone cutting2-piece, 10 in. tall steel ring insert connects using the included bolts, making set-up quick and easyIncludes 12 pre-cut top capsUse your fire pit as a grill by purchasing separately our GR44, item # 202903079Note: Product may vary by store
